title: Barrowcleft
text: Residences and markets for the farmers who work the fields and eeleries.

title: Brightstone
text: The grand mansions and luxury shops of the wealthy elite.

title: Charhollow
text: A maze of tenements and squalid row houses.

title: Charterhall
text: The city's civic offices and the hub for shops, artisans, and commerce.

title: Coalridge
text: The remnants of Doskvol's original hilltop mining settlement, now home to laborers and industrial factories.

title: Crow's Foot
text: A cramped neighborhood of multi-level streets, ruled by gangs.

title: The Docks
text: Rough taverns, tattoo parlors, fighting pits, and warehouses.

title: Dunslough
text: A labor camp served by convicts and a ghetto for the destitute poor.

title: Nightmarket
text: The trade center for exotic goods imported by rail. Many vendors also trade in illicit goods.

title: Silkshore
text: The "red lamp district" and artist community.

title: Six Towers
text: A formerly rich district, now worn down and dilapidated.

title: Whitecrown
text: The sprawling estates of the Lord Governor, Hunter Commander, Master Warden, and Doskvol Academy.
